modName: Hybrids Invincible Ebony Horse Armor for Skyrim
summary: This mod will add horse armor too all horses that uses normal saddles. In addition, it will make armored horses invincible.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/5526-1-1325904207.jpg[/img]
[size=3]If you like the horse armor, and want to see more, PLEASE ENDORSE (and spread the word). Convince me to continue![/size]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hybrid\'s - Ebony Armored_Horse 3.0
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v1.0
Date: 12/06/2011
Category: New Models and Textures
Author: Gabriel Gullbergh, Hybrid Media
Major Credit: [url=http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/user/55918-nivea]Nivea, Nifscope Savior ;)[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2753566]Foretrenty, Skyrim NPC Editor Author ;)[/url]

Version 3.0 Change Notes
====================
! Added Customizable Essential Mod for all horses (invincible)!
! Added Shadowmere Armor with ESP ! (previously unavailable)
- Added horse harness ebony style :)
- fixed horse white hair clipping
- improved bump mapping


Description
===========

[size=3]This mod will add horse armor too all horses that uses normal saddles, including shadowmere. In addition, it will make armored horses invincible. These meshes were made entirely from scratch as well as textures with pieces taken from vanilla ebony armors. This mod features the ebony style. However feel free to retexture as you like :). Also, please submit your screenshots, especially other horse breeds![/size]

[youtube]fwHgKHICG6g[/youtube]

Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file if neccesary.
4. IN THE \"DATA\" FOLDER DELETE ANY HORSES (.ESP) THAT YOU DO NOT WANT TO BE INVINCIBLE (any horses you dont own)
5. Launch Skyrim!
**IF YOU ARE USING SHADOWMERE YOU WILL NEED TO MOUNT THE HORSE UPON FIRST LOAD TO ACTIVATE THE ARMOR PERMANENTLY**

Recommended Other Mods:
=========================

Licensing/Legal
===============
I highly encourage re-textures! However, please do not upload or host the mesh without my permission.
